tool_description: Traces semantic evolution of words over time, identifying patterns of meaning change and semantic development pathways.

word.description: Word to analyze for semantic change

meaning_domains.description: Semantic domains to focus analysis on

error_messages: Word not found: The specified word has no documented semantic history.
Invalid time period: Start period must be earlier than end period.
Insufficient historical data: Not enough attestations available for reliable semantic tracking.
Language not supported: Historical semantic data unavailable for this language.
Unknown semantic domain: One or more specified meaning domains are not recognized.
usage: Provide a word, language, and time range. Optionally specify semantic domains of interest. The tool traces meaning changes over the specified period.

change_types.description: Types of semantic change identified (broadening, narrowing, etc.)
